snippet.title: Earthquake Shakes Los Angeles
snippet.description:
Earthquake Shakes Los Angeles
By James Rogers 10:17 AM EDT 03/17/14
Los Angeles is hit with a 4.4 magnitude earthquake. No injuries are reported.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/12531795/1/earthquake-shakes-los-angeles.html

snippet.title: Copper Refusing To Budge, Even For An Earthquake
snippet.description:
Copper Refusing To Budge, Even For An Earthquake
By Resource Investing News 02:03 AM EDT 04/10/14
Speculation regarding Chinese demand continued to keep the red metal in flux this week. Today, apprehension over the upcoming release of Chinese data drew prices back by 0.5 percent, to $6,636.50 per tonne.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/12668058/1/copper-refusing-to-budge-even-for-an-earthquake.html

snippet.description:

snippet.title: Fracked! Are You Covered For Man-made Earthquakes?
snippet.description:

Earthquake policies may exclude damage caused by man, such as fracking.

snippet.title: Sozzi: Earthquakes Could Shake These 3 Californian Retail Giants
snippet.description:
Sozzi: Earthquakes Could Shake These 3 Californian Retail Giants
By Brian Sozzi 03:16 PM EDT 03/31/14
The series of earthquakes that have hit California in March do appear to be pointing to the possibility of one significant earthquake in the not too distant future, which could impact Costco, Kroger and Dollar Tree.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/12566684/1/sozzi-earthquakes-could-shake-these-3-californian-retail-giants.html
